name: miswrite
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to write something in a way that is not accurate: The date has been miswritten. If a doctor mis-wrote a drug chart, they could put the patient's life at risk.
computing
  specialized to record information in the memory of a computer in a way that is not accurate: The outcome depends on the amount of data that was miswritten. A single miswritten file can cause programs to crash. Related word
write specialized
More examplesFewer examplesThe name was miswritten as “Stepham” or “Speham”.In some cases, a proper name was miswritten and then altered to its correct form.These classic texts are often written in archaic language, with frequent omissions and miswritten characters.
